name: Hook, Line, & Sprinter
description:
Hook, swing, and jump your way through a rocky pirate temple to get back your precious Froggy Hat!

Use your fishing rod as a grappling hook to find the hat that you've lost to the wind.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click [Hold] - Cast Hook

Left Click [Release] -Release Hook

Right Click [Hold & Release] - Shoot Blunderbass (This feature has no use yet)

Made by Jakob Ober, Luke Quirion, Jacob Livingston, and Dan Shaprio
